content:
May I ask that we please go ahead with merging #7155 and #7156, and I'll take care of any desired name changes in a subsequent PR? I think this is best because:

  • Any name changes will have to be made to both files, and opening a separate PR will allow me to make those changes simultaneously without affecting another PR, making the refactor easier
  • Any commit to either of the files in the interim will screw up both PRs so I would like to get them merged sooner rather than later

Thanks!
@Eric Wieser I am pinging you since you had requested the changes.
When I made my comment I wasn't aware that docs#int.two_dvd_ne_zero was already a thing that existed
I think ne_of_odd_sum should still be changed, though, so I'll do that in a new PR.
Looking again there are quite a few lemmas in those files that use sum when they mean add

In future, when you're doing a PR to make X and Y consistent, it's probably easier to review it in a single PR that sends X × Y → (X ⊔ Y) × (X ⊔ Y), rather than two PRs that send X → (X ⊔ Y) and Y → (X ⊔ Y)
But I ended up downloading both files and checking in a diff view that you've made them match (which is great, thanks!)
Okay, I'll take care of those, too.

Ah, okay. I did them in separate PRs for my own sanity - it would have been too crazy for me to keep track of what I had added and what I still needed to add to each file in a single branch. But I'll keep this in mind for next time.
Vscode should have a diff view you can open to compare the two files, which is much easier to do if both files exist in the same branch!
